column4: I need create a function which takes a few variables : FILE_NAME, SIZE, LAST_MODIFY, DEL_LINK, REN_LINK
...and which puts them in a table row (with a while cycle)  to obtain an output like this:
FILE_NAME SIZE LAST_MODIFY DEL_LINK REN_LINK
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
